lead_paragraph: The Carolina Hurricanes traded one of their top prospects yesterday, sending the promising defenseman Jack Johnson to the Los Angeles Kings in a multiplayer deal. The Hurricanes, the defending Stanley Cup champions, also sent defenseman Oleg Tverdovsky to the Kings for forward Eric Belanger and defenseman Tim Gleason.
